amendment.description: To increase the amount of funds that may be used by States for technical assistance and administrative costs under the community development block grant program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2151 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2151 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14520-14524; text: CR S14520) To increase the amount of funds that may be used by States for technical assistance and administrative costs under the community development block grant program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2151 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2151 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 2150.
